property.name: heap.size
property.description: To set the total heap size for an H2O node.When launching nodes, we recommend allocating a total of four times the memory of your data. Note: Do not try to launch H2O with more memory than you have available.

property.name: cluster.name
property.description: Assign a name to the H2O instance in the cluster. Nodes with the same cluster name will form an H2O cluster.

property.name: rest.port
property.description: Specify a PORT used for REST API.

property.name: flow.dir
property.description: Specify a directory for saved flows.
